item.description:
This is a murder mysyery dinner. It looks like excellent food and a fun show. Basically, you eat dinner and participate in and watch the show.

It sounds like it would be a fun, and unique, meetup. :-)

It starts at 7:30PM so we probably want to get there around 7PM to get in line and get some good seats.

**Very important**

Each person has to make their own reservation on the website BUT we can all sit together IF everyone puts 'Jillian' as the group name on their reservation. This is the ONLY guaranteed way the group can sit together.


So, the website (given below) explains the plot. (Wonka!)

http://www.mysterycaf...
item.name: 'Death by Chocolate' murder mystery dinner
